testId.description: ID used to locate the element in unit test suites

fileName.description: The name of the file to be uploaded

uploadIcon.description: The icon displayed in file's button

uploadText.description: The text displayed in file's button

style.description: Custom styling applicable for specific cases

buttonOnRight.description: Changes button's position to its right

isFullWidth.description: The whole container (button and file name) will occupy its parent container width

isBoxed.description: Changes styling to a box style, making the button bigger and file name's position below the button

color.description: Color based on bulma's color tokens

onClick.description: Click function, alone does not nothing, but can be reused for other components
